description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cn7i7","text":"This protocol describes the tissue preparation processes for the CODEX® (now PhenoCycler™) system by Akoya Biosciences. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"feip3","text":"Gently place coverslips at the bottom of a 500-mL glass beaker and swirl to spread the coverslips out. Add approximately   poly-L-lysine solution to the beaker, ensuring coverslips are fully submerged. Rotate the beaker at a 45° angle for   to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":121,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":239,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"9F7672A0C41511EC8AFB89BFD7DFEAF9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"5BFA7AE0D60711EC857F214F05E97618","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eui6d","text":"Slowly pipet off the poly-L-lysine solution and dispose.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fadm7","text":"Spread WypAll® towels on the benchtop. In small batches, remove coverslips from the beaker, separate from one another, and place individual coverslips side by side on towels. Layer another towel on top and gently dab to remove excess liquid. Leave on benchtop until completely dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32qbu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb8oc","text":"ⓘ Coated coverslips can be stored in a petri dish for up to 2 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae41l","text":"  and repeat for a total of 5-7 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6B4E2000D60711EC857F214F05E97618","id":0,"step_guid":"F8E93020C3ED11EC8AFB89BFD7DFEAF9","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9giae","text":"Fill the beaker containing the coverslips to half volume with Milli-Q® water. Swirl gently, let sit for  , and then slowly pour off water into the sink.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"635FA350D60711EC857F214F05E97618","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ikum","text":"Cover beaker with parafilm and incubate for minimum of   at  . Coverslips can sit in the poly-L-lysine solution for up to one week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"4978264DC41811EC97780A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"497826DEC41811EC97780A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"165or","text":"Obtain   to   sections, using a fine-tipped paintbrush to guide the section onto base and place coverslip onto section (Figure 1b-1d).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":120,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"2D53DBD0C4E811EC86449D343656C900","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"6"}},"1":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"33C02550C4E811EC86449D343656C900","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"10"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffkca","text":"Using forceps, slot coverslips with mounted tissue into a plastic coverslip holder under the appropriate donor/block ID label(s).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bienp","text":"As necessary, mount adjacent sections onto Gold Plus slides (for traditional immunohistochemistry) and/or ITO slides (for mass spectrometry). Record all sections cut, the thickness, and any additional block shaved off in the process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
